```{r setup, include=FALSE}
options(
  htmltools.dir.version = FALSE, formatR.indent = 2, width = 55, digits = 4
)

pkg_lst <- c(
    "knitr",
    "readODS",
    "dplyr",
    "flextable",
    "officedown",
    "officer"
)

# 填上你需要用到的包，如 c('ggplot2', 'dplyr')
lapply(pkg_lst, function(pkg) {
  if (system.file(package = pkg) == '') install.packages(pkg)
})
```
